main event: Two witnesses observed a UFO in a zig-zag formation over Suffolk, Virginia on 20 Mar 59.
interesting points: The UFO was reported to have a round shape and orange color., It moved very high and fast with no visible propulsion system., The object made a screaming noise during the sighting., The witnesses experienced visibility issues with the ceiling unknown., The report indicates there was no physical evidence or meteorological activity at the time.
witness description: Mr. RK and Dr. CMA from Suffolk, Virginia
